Description: Required Skills to be successful•   Alertness and Problem Solving Skill•   Computer Skills•   Good Judgement Skills , Decision Making and Social Perceptiveness. •   Problem Sensitivity•   Deductive & Inductive Reasoning•   Sales Related Skills About the TeamThe team is a group of Sales Executives, Sales Administrators, Guest Relations Officers and they are highly motivated, collaborative and fun .All of them will be reporting to you as a Sales Manager that will be reporting to the Dealer Principal .  What equips you for the role•   Bachelor’s Degree or Equivalent•   8 years’ experience in Sales where 1-2 years in supervisory role.We’re here to provide excellent service but a little help from you can ensure a five-star candidate experience from start to finish.Job Details
